actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance to the Holmes County School District of all the right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a certain tract of land in Holmes County, Mississippi.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey specified lands to the Holmes County School District, in Holmes County, Mississippi.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance to the Holmes County School District of all the right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a certain tract of land in Holmes County, Mississippi.
